items.content_html: A lightweight web audio player to listen to the various albums and EP's of Burner Records. Create, remove, and modify songs in a Queue. Auto-play available on desktop. Sort the song list using different criteria. Listen to the burner catalog on the go using the mobile site as well.
items.title: ForestW70/sketches-bcc-client: A lightweight web audio player to listen to the various albums and EP's of Burner Records. Create, remove, and modify songs in a Queue. Auto-play available on desktop. Sort the song list using different criteria. Listen to the burner catalog on the go using the mobile site as well.
